mapper.update: update ecs_supplier_nav set ctype = #{ctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ifshow = #{ifshow,jdbcType=BIT}, vieworder = #{vieworder,jdbcType=BIT}, opennew = #{opennew,jdbcType=BIT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ctype, cid, name, ifshow, vieworder, opennew, url, type, supplier_id from ecs_supplier_nav
